column4: hey all a question, if i copy the .deb files from /etc/cache/apt to say a cd if i need to reinstall
and do a apt-get dist-update will it grab  the files from there  or download them
why would you do that? It's less hacky to just run dpkg -i <file> on the .deb
:what if i copy the files back to the /etc/cache/apt folder  is what i mean
